sys_hub_flow.description: flow to find needit task older than the number of days in the auto close applicaiton property, close them, an open a follow-up task for management.
sys_hub_flow.name: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Task

sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{19166eaa-8bf4-44d0-9822-fbfa3c06fc09.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of {{19166eaa-8bf4-44d0-9822-fbfa3c06fc09.item.due_date}}was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{bc70b06a-a1f0-4d8b-afea-6eb0c8f22827.property_value}} days.
